Class ResizeListener

java.lang.Object
java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
ResizeListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener
class ResizeListener extends MouseAdapter
ResizeListener provides manual resizing capability for an undecorated JFrame. It allows resizing by dragging any edge of the frame, mimicking native window resizing. This class is useful for custom window panels without the default OS window chrome.

    • getResizeSide

      private int getResizeSide(Point p)
      Determines which side of the window (if any) is being interacted with based on proximity.
      Parameters:
      p - the point of the mouse press relative to the frame
      Returns:
      an integer indicating which edge is active: 0=left, 1=right, 2=top, 3=bottom, -1=none
